product_name: Mountain Summit Gear Outdoor 35 Pack - Special Buy
long_description: Built for the backcountry, this lightweight 35-liter pack features water-repellent coating and a bottom-stashed raincover, helping you stay comfortable and dry on burly overnights or week-long treks.
short_description: Built for the backcountry, this lightweight 35-liter pack features water-repellent coating and a bottom-stashed raincover, helping you stay comfortable and dry on burly overnights or week-long treks.
